effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

flavorTexts.text:
The user torches everything around it in an inferno
of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits
with a burn.
